title: Wargame.Red.Dragon-CODEX
description:
Wargame.Red.Dragon-CODEX

     CODEX PRESENTS:

     Wargame Red Dragon

     Release Date :  4/2014                         Protection : Steam
     Discs        :  1                              Genre      : Action 
 

   The new reference in RTS at its best! The Wargame series returns to
   duty, larger, richer and more spectacular than ever before. In Wargame
   Red Dragon, you are engaged in a large-scale conflict where Western
   forces clash against the Communist bloc. 

    - Extract
    - Burn or mount the .iso
    - Run setup.exe and install
    - Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
    - Play 

    When asked to login just press cancel ...
    Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
    online ..
